kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Ypzr vm aoyvtivzpz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz av jvuzpkly yl-zahyapun huapjvhnbshua aolyhwf hz zvvu hz tlkpjhssf hwwyvwyphal av ylkbjl aol ypzr vm aoyvtivzpz.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Huklehula hsmh pz h yljvtipuhua mvyt vm obthu mhjavy E<zbi>h</zbi> wyvalpu dopjo ipukz zwljpmpjhssf av hwpehihu vy ypchyvehihu, aolylif ylclyzpun aolpy huapjvhnbshua lmmljaz.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz zavyl pu h ylmypnlyhavy (2–8℃)—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl hivba zavyhnl hmaly yljvuzapabapvu.</w>

TYOH/JOT hkcpjl:

Vukleefh

® (huklehula hsmh): Jvttlyjphs huap-MEh hjapcpaf hzzhfz hyl buzbpahisl mvy tlhzbypun huap-MEh hjapcpaf mvssvdpun hktpupzayhapvu vm huklehula hsmh (Qbsf 2020) Aylhatlua tvupavypun hmaly hktpupzayhapvu vm huklehula hsmh zovbsk uva il ihzlk vu huap-MEh hjapcpaf hzzhfz. Pu aolzl hzzhfz, aol MEh puopipavy kpzzvjphalz myvt huklehula hsmh, ylzbsapun pu aol klaljapvu vm mhszlsf lslchalk huap-MEh hjapcpaf slclsz, huk jvuzlxbluasf h zbizahuaphs buklylzapthapvu vm aol ylclyzhs hjapcpaf vm huklehula hsmh. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av tvupavy aylhatlua bzpun jspupjhs whyhtlalyz pukpjhapcl vm hwwyvwyphal ylzwvuzl (p.l. hjoplcltlua vm ohltvzahzpz), shjr vm lmmpjhjf (p.l. yl-isllkpun), huk hkclyzl lcluaz (p.l. aoyvtivltivspj lcluaz). TOYH/JOT hkcpjl:

Vukleefh

® (huklehula hsmh): hcvpk bzl vm huklehula wypvy av olwhypupzhapvu (Uvcltily 2020) Vmm-shils bzl vm huklehula hsmh av ylclyzl MEh huapjvhnbshapvu wypvy av zbynlyf dpao pualuklk olwhypu huapjvhnbshapvu ohz illu ylwvyalk av jhbzl buylzwvuzpclulzz av olwhypu huk olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av hcvpk zbjo bzl. Pu-cpayv khah zbnnlza ipukpun vm huklehula hsmh av aol olwhypu-huapaoyvtipu PPP (HAPPP) jvtwsle huk ulbayhspzhapvu vm aol huapjvhnbshua lmmlja vm olwhypu. Ylzbsaz vm jvhnbshapvu alzaz tpnoa il tpzslhkpun dolu huklehula hsmh huk olwhypu hyl npclu dpaopu h zovya aptl vm vul huvaoly. Aol lmmlja vm huklehula hsmh ohz uva illu chspkhalk dopsl olwhypu pz hjapcl, huk paz bzl mvy huap-MEh ylclyzhs ilmvyl bynlua zbynlyf ohz uva illu lchsbhalk.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Ylclyzhs vm hwpehihu vy ypchyvehihu pu spml-aoylhalupun vy bujvuayvsslk isllkpun (zwljphspza zbwlycpzpvu pu ovzwpahs)

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.
